column1: dixie a. houston chapman| dixie chapman 75 of butler
column2: missouri departed this life on sunday
column4: 2015 at her home in butler surrounded by love and family. dixie is survived by her three daughters
column5: lana bretch and her husband kenneth of ft. smith
column7: barbara thomas and her husband michael of garden city
column9: and le. ann edger and her husband larry of riverside
column11: max eutsler and ed eutsler both of springfield
column12: missouri; five grandchildren; nine great grandchildren; other relatives and many friends. no services scheduled. cremation. final arrangements entrusted to cass county cremation service. a complete obituary will be posted when that information becomes available.
